guide.title: ğŸ“š **KIK Picture Tokens - Complete Guide**
guide.intro: Welcome to the complete guide! Choose a topic to learn more:
guide.basics_what_are_tokens:
**What are KIK Tokens?**

KIK Tokens are unique digital assets that represent your creativity. Each token can have a picture attached to it - either uploaded by you or generated by AI.
guide.basics_how_to_get:
**How to get tokens?**

1. **Daily claim**: Get 3 free tokens every day
2. **Referral system**: Earn +1 token when friends join and +1 token/day per active friend
3. **Special events**: Participate in events for bonus tokens
guide.basics_why_attach:
**Why attach pictures?**

Attaching pictures to ALL your tokens is required to:
- Receive your daily 3 tokens
- Earn referral bonuses
- Level up your account
- Unlock special features
guide.referral_how_to_invite:
**How to invite friends?**

1. Use the /invite command
2. Share your unique referral link
3. Friends click the link and join
4. You automatically receive bonuses
guide.referral_bonuses:
**Referral Bonuses:**

- **+1 token** when friend joins (one-time)
- **+1 token per day** for each active friend
- **Active friend** = friend who attached pictures to ALL their tokens yesterday
- **You must be active** to receive daily referral bonuses
guide.referral_tips:
**Referral Tips:**

âœ… Share your link on social media
âœ… Explain the benefits to friends
âœ… Help friends get started
âœ… Stay active to keep earning
âœ… Check referral timers in /invite
guide.wallet_how_it_works:
**How the wallet works:**

Your KIK Wallet stores all your tokens securely. You can:
- View your token balance
- See your collection
- Track your earnings
- Prepare for future trading
guide.wallet_sending:
**Sending Tokens:**

Token sending will be available after 1,000,000 users join. You'll be able to:
- Send tokens to friends
- Transfer pictures with tokens
- See ownership history
- Trade on marketplace
guide.wallet_rental:
**Token Rental:**

Coming soon! You'll be able to:
- Rent tokens to friends temporarily
- Set rental duration (5 minutes to 24 hours)
- Automatic return after time expires
- Earn passive income from rentals
guide.social_view_friends:
**Viewing Friends:**

1. Use /friends command (coming soon)
2. See friends' public pictures
3. Check their activity and levels
4. Compare your progress
guide.social_levels:
**Levels & Experience:**

- **Gain XP** by attaching pictures (+10 XP per picture)
- **Level up** to unlock new features
- **Compete** on leaderboards
- **Show off** your achievements
guide.social_ratings:
**Ratings & Leaderboards:**

- Top users by token count
- Most active referrers
- Highest level players
- Best picture collections
- Weekly and monthly winners
guide.faq_what_is_kik:
**What is KIK Picture Tokens?**

KIK is a blockchain-based game where you collect tokens, attach pictures, and earn rewards. It's fun, creative, and potentially valuable!
guide.faq_how_to_start:
**How do I start?**

Just type /start and follow the instructions. You'll receive 3 free tokens to begin your journey!
guide.faq_why_no_tokens:
**Why didn't I get my daily tokens?**

You need to attach pictures to ALL tokens from yesterday. Check /attach to see which tokens need pictures.
guide.faq_how_to_earn:
**How can I earn more tokens?**

1. Claim daily tokens
2. Invite friends
3. Stay active
4. Participate in events
5. Complete special tasks
guide.faq_is_it_free:
**Is KIK Picture Tokens free?**

Yes! It's completely free to join and play. You can earn tokens without spending any money.
guide.contact_response: We usually respond within 24 hours. Please be patient!
